description: A video posted on social media appears to show the execution of two Armenian prisoners by troops from Azerbaijan.
title: Nagorno-Karabakh conflict: 'Execution' video prompts war crime probe
title_page: Nagorno-Karabakh conflict: 'Execution' video prompts war crime probe - BBC News
maintext: It's likely the videos were recorded at some point between 9-15 October. Azerbaijan announced that Hadrut had been taken on 9 October, although it later emerged that, while they had taken some strategic heights around the town, fierce fighting was still going on for control of the town itself on 12 October.
